select r1_0.id,r1_0.created_date,r1_0.created_by,r1_0.is_active,r1_0.is_delete,r1_0.last_modified_date,r1_0.role,r1_0.updated_by from role_master r1_0 where r1_0.id=?
select u1_0.id,u1_0.created_date,u1_0.created_by,u1_0.is_active,u1_0.is_delete,u1_0.last_modified_date,u1_0.role_id,u1_0.updated_by,u1_0.user_id from user_role_mapping u1_0 where u1_0.user_id=?

select u1_0.id,u1_0.created_date,u1_0.created_by,u1_0.user_email,u1_0.is_active,u1_0.is_delete,u1_0.last_modified_date,u1_0.password,u1_0.updated_by,u1_0.user_name from user_master u1_0 where u1_0.user_email=?
